item.title: Docker image - list
item.description: Docker has got couple commands that allows us to manage images. Mostly we are getting list of images. Basic listing Basic images listing with command: docker image ls. Size is cumulative value from all layers needed for image. Below images are local images without repository specified. [lukas@docker-host ~]## docker image ls REPOSITORY TAG IMAGE ID CREATED SIZE postgres latest 9907cacf0c01 6 days ago 314MB alpine latest a187dde48cd2 2 weeks ago 5.
